name: E.K.B.E
description:
TR  Yaklaşık 1 haftada kodladığım ve tasarladığım oyun sizlerle beraber :D Bu oyun diğer oyunlarıma nazaran daha farklı bir mantığa sahip.Bu oyunda,gelen ekmekleri elinizle kesmeden bölüyosunuz :D Oyunu yapma fikri,2 hafta önce okulda arkadaşlarımla khontkarın şarkısında geçen "ekmeği kesmeden böl elle" sözüyle çok dalga geçiyoduk ve bende "neden bundan oyun olmasın ki?" diye sordum kendime.

Oyunda ekmekler size doğru geliyor ve ekmeklere temas ederek onları bölüyorsunuz.Pek elle bölüyosunuz gibi değil biliyorum xd.

  KONTROLLER/CONTROLS

Yukarıgitmek için:W    bu kadar xd

To go up:W    thats all lmao

(if your resolution is not 1920x1080,you might have some graphical issues)

OYUN HAKKINDA/ABOUT GAME

Breads are randomly spawning and you are getting points by touching them.And this game has 4 stages.When your stage gets higher,if you miss a bread,its decreasing your point more,spawning breads faster,and increasing your movement speed more.

ENG:Here is the my new game that i made in 1 week :D This game's logic is more different than my other games.In this game,you are splitting breads without cutting with your hands lmao.Well you can ask "wtf was happened and you had this idea?"

Well,in our classroom,me and my friend were making jokes about famous turkish rapper khontkar's lyric that says "split the bread with hands without cutting", and after that day,i spoke to myself "Why wouldnt i make a game about this lyric?" And,thats the result xd.

In game,you are splitting breads with touching them with your body(yes its not with hands but dont judge me)

if you liked my game,please leave a comment about game,and leave a like or heart i dont know so much lmao.have a nice day :D

CREDITS

Textures/Level Design/Coding : Gürkna

Music: Jeremy Blake (god bless no copy 8 bit musics lol)

Inspired by TR rapper khontkar's lyric...
